All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
 
AppConfig
responsible for saving running mode of the application
Card
Card class to represent the card type The card type can be "bomb", "blockade", "airlift", "negotiate" The card type is randomly generated The card type can be retrieved
Command
This class contains all the commands that can be used in the game.
Continent
Continent class to store the continent details
Country
Country class to store the country details
CountryController
The CountryController class is responsible for handling country related commands.
Debug
The Debug class is responsible for logging messages to the console and a log file.
EditMapPhase
 
ExecuteOrdersPhase
 
FinishPhase
 
GameEngine
The GameEngine class is responsible for handling the game loop and the game phases.
GameGraphUtils
The GameGraphUtils class is responsible for providing utility methods to check the connectivity of the map graph.
GameMapReader
The GameMapReader class is responsible for reading and parsing a game map file.
GameMenu
The GameMenu class is responsible for handling the game menu and starting the game.
GameState
The GameState class is responsible for keeping track of the game state.
GameState.GameAction
This enum represents the game actions.
IssueOrdersPhase
 
MapController
The MapController class is responsible for handling the map parsing, validation, and display of continents and countries from a game map file.
OrderController
The OrderController class is responsible for handling the order commands.
Phase
 
Player
The Player class is responsible for keeping track of the player's state.
PlayerController
The PlayerController class is responsible player related commands.
